channel.title: Error with runserver
channel.description:
So I just dled assaultX 562 and i hit runserver but it had an error: [code][2012/03/26 20:21:06] [Server]: rs2hd framework [2012/03/26 20:21:06] [Server]: Loaded 15500item prices. Loaded all shops. [2012/03/26 20:21:06] [Server]: Reading mapdata... [2012/03/26 20:21:06] [Server]: Loaded mapdata. [2012/03/26 20:21:06] [Server]: Loaded packet handlers. [2012/03/26 20:21:06] [Server]: Loading item definitions... [2012/03/26 20:21:06] [Server]: Loaded 11992 item definitions. [2012/03/26 20:21:06] [Server]: Loading npc definitions... [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: Loaded 276 npc definitions. [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: Loading world list data... [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: Setting up world... [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: Loading clans.... [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: Loaded 0 clans. [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConversionEx ception: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args cons tructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args con structor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 2 ------------------------------- [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:88) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractReferenceU nmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections. AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:77) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections. CollectionConverter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:68) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections. CollectionConverter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:61) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:81) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractReferenceU nmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.c onvertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.s tart(TreeUnmarshaller.java:142) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractTreeMarsha llingStrategy.unmarshal(AbstractTreeMarshallingStrategy.java:33) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStre am.java:907) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStre am.java:893) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream .java:845) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.rs2hd.model.World.setEngine(World.java:407) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.rs2hd.Server.<init>(Server.java:73) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: com.rs2hd.Main$1.run(main.java:36) [2012/03/26 20:21:07] [Server]: java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
The runserver.bat is constructed as follows: [code]@echo off title AssualtX cd src cd .. java -Xms250m -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/* com.rs2hd.Main pause[/code] Help please?

item.title: Error with runserver
item.dc:creator: @cam_man98 cam man98
item.description:

So I just dled assaultX 562 and i hit runserver but it had an error:
